page.title: 08North St.Helens 1945 & 1985
page.content: Much has changed in this area in the 40 years since{1945.}Large estates of both private and council housing have covered much{farm_land.}Many{hedgerows have disappeared leaving large open fields.The air is much{cleaner}because many houses have{central_heating}and smoke control has eliminated{smogs.} Much of our shopping is done in{ {supermarkets}where you serve yourself but in some local shops you are still served.{40 years}ago{transport}was different.To get to St.Helens people walked or used the trolley_bus or tram while today nearly everyone has a car. There are large areas used{car_parks. We still have buses in this area but are mainly used by elderly or school children.Many people still work in Glass,Coal and Pharmaceuticals but also many woman work and many people travel to Liverpool or Manchester.
